title: How to close out a game by yourself?
body:
So i just had a very frustrating game as illaoi top. I won lane hard got my turrets, took rift, got mid turrets. I was 5/0 at that point and calling my team for baron but no one would listen to me. I kept pushing and looking for team fights but my team was playing super passive for some reason. The whole time im still calling baron and its starting to tilt me so i push out a wave and get 5 manned. Still everyone is just farming even though we're ahead by a lot and i have no idea what to do. We start losing then the team finally decides to do baron, our riven jungle misses smite and we lose the game. 

I don't know what I could have done to win it seems impossible to close out a game when your team doesn't communicate or listen.

replies.body: nag your support and team about warding, eventually you'll be able to make a good pick and teamfight, and then you can push and pressure and get objectives. Vision control can inspire great confidence, in even the biggest cowards.

Many games are won or lost by a smite on baron, that's just the nature of the game nowadays. The majority of jgs dont even pay attention to their targets abilities or cooldowns let alone their own until u reach gold division and even then id question if they are reliable. Naggin support results in negative behaviour 80% of the time. {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
